lines.text: You little bitch! I'll get you in the sequel for this!
Why do these things always have to start with young, beautiful co-eds going into the basement?
How come every time you stay in an old, spooky house it has to lightning and thunder?
Well, I think it's standard issue.

[after suggesting that Megan go downstairs to check on Roxanne]
Either way, it's a dark, stormy night and we're rour young, attractive girls in a big, spooky house all alone. If we don't go downstairs one at a time, how will we ever get bumped off without the others knowing about it?
I brought along my portable TV set, in case you'd like to use it.
Don't tell me you kids don't enjoy a good cartoon!
